translated: â€œWhat is the emptiness of defining characteristics?

original: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /

original: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /

original: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /

original: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of formation is to form.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of consciousness is to be aware.

original: phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of the aggregates is suffering.

original: khams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid /ğŸ”½skye mched ni skye ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: khams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid / skye mched ni skye ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of the elements is to be poisonous.ğŸ”½The defining characteristic of the sense sources is to be doors of arising.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of dependent origination is to be a coming together.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid /ğŸ”½bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /

translated: The perfection of morality has the characteristic of being without torment.ğŸ”½The perfection of patience has the characteristic of being without anger.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of effort has the characteristic of being invincible.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of meditation has the characteristic of being well-collected.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of wisdom has the characteristic of being without attachment.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the formless absorptions have the characteristic of being without disturbance.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid /ğŸ”½rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid /ğŸ”½rnam par thar @228a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid / rnam par thar @228a *//
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment have the characteristic of arising.ğŸ”½The emptiness gate of liberation has the characteristic of being void.

original: pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The signless gate of liberation has the characteristic of being peaceful.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The gate of liberation of wishlessness has the characteristic of eliminating suffering.

original: rnam par grol ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid /

original: stobs rnams ni shin tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: stobs rnams ni shin tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid /

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The fearlessnesses have the characteristic of being very stable.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid / byams pa chen po ni phan pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The correct understandings have the characteristic of being unbreakable.ğŸ”½Great love has the characteristic of accomplishing benefit.

original: snying rje chen po ni yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Great compassion has the characteristic of being a complete protection.

original: dga' ba chen po ni rang tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po ni rang tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Great joy has the characteristic of being a great delight.

original: btang snyoms chen po ni 'dre ba med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: btang snyoms chen po ni 'dre ba med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Great equanimity has the characteristic of being without mixing.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The eighteen unshared qualities of the Buddha have the characteristic of being unstealable.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de /

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither impermanent nor destroyed.

original: 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de dag thams cad stong ste /

translated: The characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of unconditioned phenomena are empty of those characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //

original: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
